subject: RTSC Talk Radio --- (Tonight) at 9pm est
author: Urkel23
full_text:
Our guest for tonight's show is Ghost Box guy Glenn Orwan III. Glenn has been
doing work with ghost boxes for a while and has even created his own device. 
Please tune in for what will be an interesting interview.

He's how to tune in and chat:

http://www.stevehultay.com/rtsctalkradiogolive.html

The call in # for questions for our guest is 732-587-7041 

Hope to see you there,
-Steve
